job_title: Full-Stack Angular/Java Developer or Lead with UI Angular
jd: From: Aryan, PVK Corporation aryan@pvkc.com Reply to: aryan@pvkc.com Dear Consultant,Hope you are doing great.We are Hiring!Job Role: Full-Stack Angular/Java Developer or Lead with UI AngularLocation: Philadelphia, PA - Hybrid 2 days onsiteDuration: 12+ monthsJob Summary:• 12+ yrs. of experience as Full-Stack with focus UI Angular 14+ Java based applications.• Experience with Spring Framework.• Cloud experience preferably in MS Azure.Thanks & RegardsAryanPVK CorporationDesk: 571-229-5250 Ext: 111Dir.: 571-222-3666Fax: 571-291-4522Email: aryan@pvkc.comURL: www.pvkc.com44081 Pipeline Plaza Suite 105-5 Ashburn, VA 20147
